programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

programme.title: Speed Cops
programme.desc: Road police on the hunt for posers and speeders all over Germany. The professionals know exactly whats impressive about cars - and whats illegal.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: American petrol head and reality TV star, Richard Rawlings, famous for his show Fast N Loud, visits struggling garages and car workshops that are desperate for a helping hand. Alongside the team of world-class mechanics from his Gas Monkey Garage, Richard invests his precious time and money to get these toiling businesses back where they belong. The team visit workshops all over the USA, using their knowledge and experience to rev up the old girls and get their engines purring once more. With a serious amount of elbow grease on top of the help from Richards team, the owners have a shot once more at a successful business.

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Seg 1 Body Transfer Illusion. The Body Transfer Illusion is the illusion of perceiving another object to be part of your body. This is best exemplified by the rubber hand experiment where in a volunteer is a shown a rubber hand while their real hand is obscured. Both the fake and real hand is subject to the same stimulus and soon the volunteer will perceive the fake hand as theirs. Seg 2 Autokinetic Effect. The Autokinetic Effect is the effect caused by subtle movements in our eyes when looking at dark environments. This causes stationary light sources to be perceived as moving even though they arent. Seg 3 Moon Illusion. The Moon Illusion is the illusion where the moon appears to change sizes during different periods in time when especially when it appears closer to the horizon in fact the moons size remains constant. This happens because we are able to compare the moons size with visual references like trees and buildings when it appears nearer the horizon. Seg 4 Geometric Illusions. Geometric Illusions are illusions that can literally be illustrated on paper. This type of illusions make use of geometric properties of renderings and illustration and make them appear different in terms of points, length and curvature. Seg 5 Stereoscopy. Stereoscopy is the technique where in our eyes are made to perceive two images that make up one whole image. This technique enables us perceive 3 dimensions from 2 flat image sources.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Seg 1 Animation. Animation is the process and technique that involves creating the illusion of movement from still drawings and inanimate objects. It is achieved by displaying images with slight variations in a rapid and successive manner thus making our eyes perceive the illusion of movement. Seg 2 Aviation Illusions. Aviation illusions are the sensory illusions associated with taking flight. When pilots take flight their vestibular system, the sensory system responsible for balance, is affected by conflicting stimulus from what the pilot sees and feels during flight. Seg 3 Spinning Dancer. The spinning dancer illusion is an illusion that was created by Noboyuki Kayahara. One can either perceive the dancer as spinning clockwise or counter clockwise. This phenomenon is explained by Bistable perception which states that perception can be altered subjectively just by how an object is observed. Seg 4 Mirage. Mirages are a physical optical phenomenon that can be observed when there is a difference in the temperature in the surrounding air of an area. The different temperatures of the air causes light to refract and cause weird distortions when viewed at the correct angle. This can range from weird reflections to distortions and even the appearance of floating objects. Seg 5 Rainbow Formation. Rainbows are formed as a result of sunlight being refracted and reflected by tiny drops of water in the atmosphere. The water droplets act as prism that can split the suns white light into the spectrum of visible colors thus creating the effect of a colorful rainbow.

programme.title: Quirky Science
programme.desc: Plastic has become ubiquitous. Impressive, since wed been living without them for centuries! We have grown dependent on plastics in many ways. The production industry uses it to connect the parts that make machinery: our trillions of toilet bowls need it, let alone wash machines, computers, toothbrushes, pens and traffic lights. Can you imagine that plastic was accidentally invented for the purpose of making billiard balls? Though, its inventor had used something now called guncotton, which led to a rather explosive game of pool. In the end, the first plastic was discovered when someone witnessed how Southeast Asian farmers used the poop of a little beetle, called shellac, to preserve wood. When looking for a substitute, Leo Beakeland created "Bakelite" and that substance turned out to be the first plastic. Nylon followed, the first man-made synthetic plastic, developed by Dupont to replace silk. Nylon isnt that difficult to make yourself, amazingly. During WW2 all nylon production went into the manufacturing of parachutes, leading Dupont and others to stop producing pantyhose. It led to true nylon riots. Plastics were plain out popular. Indeed, the age of plastic had only just begun. But plastic is made with oil and is hard to break down, which calls for a solution. A company in the US is creating a bioplastic grown inside microorganisms. In fact - soon theyll have plants cultivating plastic… plastic grown in the field? Now that is quirky!

programme.title: Quirky Science
programme.desc: Rubber comes from trees. South American tribes used it long before the world got to know about it. When Columbus witnessed Haitian natives playing ball he found himself mesmerized by the bouncing goo. The South American tribes also made "waterproof" shoes. When Western ships and their sailors brought these back home, the rubber melted on peoples feet. And so did their profits. A stationer accidentally discovered the stuff made a pencil stripe disappear, by rubbing it, and suggested to call it India Rubber. It took decades for someone to discover how to prevent rubber from melting in heat or stiffening in cold. Charles Goodyear found out how, by dropping a lump of natural rubber on his wifes stove. By now, chemists know that the vulcanization process links the rubber molecules like pearls on a string, making each piece of rubber one large molecule! Goodyears invention spurs the Industrial Revolution. Rubber becomes such a wanted good it instigated a rubber boom - turning Manaus, a remote Brazilian jungle town, into one of the richest cities on earth. This Brazilian monopoly of rubber ended with the theft of 70,000 seeds, by a British traveler named Henry Wickham. It takes decades for someone to discover synthetic rubber. While one researcher was looking for something to replace the rubber in tires - she ended up discovering a material that is so tough it can stop bullets: Kevlar, which also makes a nice vest!

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea. When it sets in the West it reveals to us its many billions of sibling stars populating the night sky. We study our Sun closely, and like a Rosetta stone it can reveal the secrets of all the other stars above.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system. With technological advances and improved techniques scientists are discovering more and more worlds every day. With confidence scientists now calculated there could be as many as 40 billion Earth like planets in our Milky Way galaxy alone.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its one of the worlds most famous train stations. GRAND CENTRAL TERMINAL. Well take you on a trip to reveal its many fascinating secrets! And if they are cleaned without water, how do clothes get spotless when they are DRY CLEANED?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its cheesy and and eaten all over the world! Youll learn how DOMINICKS PIZZA became DOMINOS PIZZA . And we all know how going to a circus wouldnt be complete without fluffy sweet COTTON CANDY! Well explain how this feathery goodness SPUN to life! And all the spy action heroes use them, but where did the term GADGET really come from?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its been sweetening America for almost 40 years! Now, find out the truth behind how SWEET N LOW actually got its name! And why do we yell SHOTGUN when getting into a car with friends? Then, is it really bad luck to open an umbrella in the house? And, learn the salty truth on how the POTATO CHIP was invented out of ANGER!

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team head to Tutbury Castle in Derbyshire to investigate the paranormal reports at the location. Past Hunters appear to have caught the Tutbury Ghost on camera.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters investigate Thackray Medical Museum, believed to one of Leeds most haunted buildings. Workers claim to have witnessed constant paranormal activity in the museum and one claim is that two Victorian ghosts are trapped inside of the location.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Well find out why they called Minneapolis the "Mill City" when we visit the Mill City Museum. Then we march over to the Unions Fort Snelling, the first permanent structure in Minnesota, and then head underground and learn about St. Pauls organized crime hide outs.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: San Antonio is rich with Texas, Mexican, and Spanish history. We make our last stand at the Alamo, and visit Missions National Historical Park. Lastly, we spelunk the Natural Bridge Caverns underground.

programme.title: Natures Force
programme.desc: How are Rainbows formed and whats their science? We look at the largest Hail ever recorded and explain why it comes in so many shapes and sizes. Global Warming is a big issue and topic, and we give a nutshell insight to its meaning and impact on many levels. Forecasting is key and crucial to living with nature and its weather, as it involves precision technologies and expertise. Typhoon Halyan is an example of one of the most devastating storms in recent history and its story illustrates the power and destruction that Typhoons can cause.

programme.title: Natures Force
programme.desc: Snow is a fascinating world of crystals that animals, plants, and humans have had to adapt to, in order to benefit from its best and survive its worst attributes. Some communities live with Tornadoes by building homes with survival features and rather than get out of their paths, they rely on warning systems and classifications. And behind all great weather events is Wind, find out how and why it can change from a gentle breeze into a devastating gale force and where does it go? Natures force can be mystical and puzzling and the Sunshower has been the subject of myths and legends and superstitions, but it does have a scientific explanation.

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Hes known as the "Birdman of Loro Parque" and Rafa, the Loro Parque Foundation Scientific Director wears the badge with pride. Every day he surrounds himself with all things ornithological - from parrots and puffins to penguins. But its what hes carrying through the zoo that brings all the birds to the yard. Any guesses? Youve heard of the film "How to train your Dragon" - today Inaki has to try and train an anteater (and hes not sure whats proving easier)! With anteaters being the stubborn but sensitive types, Inakis digging deep into his bag of tricks - beginning with the old favourite, some vanilla yoghurt. Will Sue-Anne the anteater succumbs to Inakis tasty charms or will she thumb her (rather long) nose at him instead?

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Federica the turtle has arrived from Italy after a run in with a container ship. Loro Parques offered to be her forever home, but how will she go sharing her new digs with others? Youve heard of a fish out of water - try a turtle! Esmeralda the iguana has a lumpy belly and Jorge the vet is worried. Hes hoping its a bounty of eggs but knows he shouldnt count his iguanas before they hatch. Its fingers crossed for some scaly babies!

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Meet My Wild Friend
programme.desc: Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals. The director of The First Cry, Gilles de Maistre has traveled the world in search of children who maintain unusual and special relationships with wild animals. With the strength of innocence, the power of raw faith and the magic of respect, these little princes have found the balance between two worlds in harmony with one another, where child and animal trust each other, learn to know one another, live together and love each other. Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals.

programme.title: Angelos Outdoor Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode Wanaka based Chef Angelo Georgalli is on the South Island of New Zealand diving for fresh crayfish in the waters south of Jackson Bay. Using his rustic portable kitchen, he prepares oven baked crayfish sandwiches with chilli butter, a white bean and potato topped crayfish and asparagus pie and a slow roasted crayfish with fresh watermelon and mango salad.

programme.title: Angelos Outdoor Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode Wanaka based Chef Angelo Georgalli is on the North Island of New Zealand spearfishing for kingfish just off the Matakana Coast. Using his rustic portable kitchen, he prepares a tangy ceviche salad with chilli, lime and coconut milk, morrocan spiced BBQ skewers and chunky Greek marinated steaks with an Italian polenta.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is one of the few national parks in Africa where the bush meets the ocean. The big game of Africa face off with the creatures of the deep. Our host goes a little rogue for supper and tries his hand at surf netting prawns after spending a day looking for the elusive elephants of Saadani.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: If there ever was a lost wildlife gem, it would be Mikumi. Here many of the Big Twelve live their lives against the backdrop of one of the most scenic parks in Africa. Bill takes a break from the wildlife safari to investigate the huge salt works at the edge of the park and how it may impact future conservation.

programme.title: Journeys in India
programme.desc: There is no figure in Indian history that rivals Gandhi. Bill explores the land Gandhi called home and in the process, learns about the man himself. But Ahmedabad is more than Gandhi…its rich history and unusual architecture is revealed.

programme.title: Journeys in India
programme.desc: There is no city in India that is more British than Calcutta. The former capital of British India, Calcutta has gardens, buildings and museums to prove it. Throw away any ideas you have of this giant city and discover the treasures it holds.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Rhodes is located in the Mediterranean Sea, in a place where the Mediterranean and the Aegean Sea meet. This is one of the reasons that its eastern and western coasts are so very different from one another. Its no coincidence that its called the island of the god Helios - it has the most sunny days out of all the Greek islands - a whole 3OO sunny days a year. Rhodes is not just beaches - its a crossroads of cultures with a history going back 2400 years.

programme.title: Andalusia: The Moorish Architecture
programme.desc: Andalusia, the Spanish territory has a confluence of cultures which is represented in its architecture! Visigothic, Roman, Byzantine and Arab - the structures in the region display all these influences. Between 8th and 15th century, several dynasties from Arab to Berber conquered Andalusia impacting the way of life of people. The film tells this story through beautiful edifices of Andalusia.

programme.title: Saving Auschwitz?
programme.desc: 70 years after Auschwitz Museum was founded as the memorial site of the Shoah, this site is subject to diversions, confrontations and plundering. Several attempts to exploit and rewrite its history are at work. The danger of desensitization through mass tourism, or the attempts of the local town and its citizens to simply erase the nightmare to make place for new urban landscape are real threats affecting the future of this memorial site. Today, as the last survivors are passing on, what to do with the Auschwitz site?

programme.title: Exoplanets, Thousands Of New Worlds
programme.desc: Are we alone in the universe? This question has been one of the greatest mysteries of all time. 20 years ago, individual scientists began to challenge traditional planetary science as they set off to seek, observe and reveal the existence of unknown worlds: EXOPLANETS. The film recounts the epic journey of these astrophysicists, who turned our knowledge of the universe upside down, in their quest for extraterrestrial life.

programme.title: Freedom, the Legend Of the Eagles
programme.desc: This film is a visual thrill, a dream come true of men flying alongside the last Wild Eagle living in the Alps. It is the story of an unlikely encounter between Roï the last Sea Eagle in the wild in the French Alps and Kaaba a bird of the same species, but one that has been captive for years. With the help of one man who is going to change her destiny we witness Kaaba as she undergoes an astonishing learning process on the way to Freedom

programme.title: Wax in the City
programme.desc: Africa is in fashion! Its flag? Wax print, which more and more Franco-African designers are choosing to incorporate into their creations. Flora Coquerel, a Franco-Beninese woman and the winner of MissFrance 2014, invites us to follow them in their intense and globalised life for a success story - how the colours of a simple fabric have become the symbol of the cultural melting pot of an entire generation!

programme.title: In the Sea
programme.desc: About 71% of our planets surface is covered by water, and about 97% of it is in the oceans. The sea also produces most of the oxygen we breathe. Thus, stimulating conservation and learning about also produces most of the oxygen we breathe. Thus, stimulating conservation and learning about the marine environment is fundamental to our very existence. This series follows scientists who work in five projects in the Petrobras Socio-environmental Program.

programme.title: In the Darkness
programme.desc: An immersion in the heart of the biggest West-African prison: Abidjan. Located out of sight at the border of the Banco forest, this prison host 5,000 inmates but has capacity for 1,500. With the inmates help, life inside is organized, and a degree of stability exists.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Ordsall Hall is over 820 years old. It has been put to many uses including a family home, working mens club and church hall. With over 15 hauntings and many sightings, Ordsall Hall will certainly keep the team busy.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Hull to investigate ghostly goings on inside of a former chocolate factory. The investigation turns out to be no picnic, as the ghosts haunting make direct contact with the team.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: San Antonio is rich with Texas, Mexican, and Spanish history. We make our last stand at the Alamo, and visit Missions National Historical Park. Lastly, we spelunk the Natural Bridge Caverns underground.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bienvenido a Miami! We take a look at the history behind Floridas modern metropolis. We visit the Ancient Spanish Monastery, see the opulence of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and head into the swamp to learn about the Miccosukee indians.

programme.title: Natures Force
programme.desc: Snow is a fascinating world of crystals that animals, plants, and humans have had to adapt to, in order to benefit from its best and survive its worst attributes. Natures force can be mystical and puzzling and the Sunshower has been the subject of myths and legends and superstitions, but it does have a scientific explanation.

programme.title: Natures Force
programme.desc: What is La Nina and how is it being monitored? Find out the effects and the reach that this system is influencing. How did Indian Summer get its name and what is the science behind the phenomenon? Winter is the season that has the biggest effect on the planet, animal behaviour and often brings out the worst that nature can bring. Natures Halo is a magical sight with a scientific explanation. The story of and lessons from Hurricane Katrina give us a great understanding of the ferocity and speed that nature can unleash.

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Ubongo the gorilla has a massive cut on his foot. But how do you treat a 400-pound gorilla with a sore foot? Very carefully it seems. The Loro Parque veterinary team put all their skills to the test to tackle a problem with very, VERY big teeth. Youve heard of cattle farms and dairy farms - but what about a coral farm? Ester and her aquarium team take us behind the scenes of their newest attraction. But how will the public take to something thats not as cute and cuddly as their other exhibits? Have you ever seen a sloth take a shower? Not many people have. But when its summertime in Tenerife, the tourists arent the only ones looking to cool down. Hugo the sloth will draw back the shower curtain and reveal all...albeit verrrry slowly.

programme.title: Angelos Outdoor Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode Wanaka based Chef Angelo Georgalli is on the North Island of New Zealand fishing for snapper in the blue waters off the Matakana Coast. Using his rustic portable kitchen, he prepares a snapper burger with a creamy aioli, classic fish and chips with a coconut flour, curry and wheat beer batter and finally, stuffed and grilled snapper with a homemade pinenut pesto.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: In this first of a two-parter on the Mara, we follow the migration in anticipation of the famous river crossings. We find all three big cats and hyena waiting for their chance to get their share of the migrants. During migration, the animal numbers are staggering.

programme.title: Journeys in India
programme.desc: There is no city in India that is more British than Calcutta. The former capital of British India, Calcutta has gardens, buildings and museums to prove it. Throw away any ideas you have of this giant city and discover the treasures it holds.

programme.title: Journeys in India
programme.desc: Two of the greatest ancient monuments in the world are in South India—Hampi and Konark. These two wonders of the world were lost to the west, but now are at the top of many bucket lists. Join Bill as he takes the veil off these two incredible achievements of man.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: 100 years ago, two young Argentine pilots, Eduardo Bradley and Angel Zuloaga, were the first men to cross the Andes Mountains through the air aboard a precarious balloon. They flew more than 8. 000 meters, from Santiago of Chile to Mendoza in Argentina. Relive the feelings and passions of two men who courageously pushed the bounds of flight in ways previously unimaginable. The first attempts to fly in early 1900 and how to fly today on the Andes mountain range.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand.

programme.title: Blue World
programme.desc: In the series pilot, host Jonathan Bird travels to the Bahamas, where, in the past few years, diver interactions with Tiger sharks have become up close and personal. These large and dangerous animals are not only being hand-fed, but actually handled by divers. Jonathan learns how to flip a Tiger shark from experienced shark handlers. Next, Jonathan joins world-renown cave explorer Brian Kakuk to investigate the Crystal Cave of Abaco, Bahamas…considered the most highly-ornamented underwater cave in the world! The formations in this cave are simply stunning, and incredibly unique.

programme.title: Paris - Berlin: Shapes and Shades of History
programme.desc: Paris and Berlin have developed and grown facing each other over four centuries of tumultuous historical relationships and mutual admiration. The architecture and urbanism bear witness of this complex and rich confrontation.

programme.title: Paris - Berlin: Shapes and Shades of History
programme.desc: Paris and Berlin have developed and grown facing each other over four centuries of tumultuous historical relationships and mutual admiration. The architecture and urbanism bear witness of this complex and rich confrontation.

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Re-trace the steps of Holocaust survivor Israel Arbeiter as he returns to Poland and Germany for the final time to look for items buried in 1939 in the basement of his old home in Plock, Poland as the German army advanced. Also travel with "Izzy" to Treblinka death camp where his parents and younger brother were murdered and to Auschwitz-Birkenau, where "Izzy" used the motivation of his fathers final words to him to stay alive. He is reunited with those who, at great risk, helped him to stay alive. A somewhat strained impromptu meeting with a former German soldier is also chronicled.

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: A Company of Heroes features interviews with many of the men not focused on in the book "Band of Brothers" by Stephen Ambrose or in the television mini-series by the same name. Never before seen video and photos are also included in this film. Easy Company, the 2nd Battalion of the 506th Parachute Infantry Regiment of the 101st Airborne Division, widely known as the "Screaming Eagles," remains one of the most revered combat units in U.S. military history.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: For over 24 years, East Timor (now known as Timor Leste) endured a crushing occupation inflicted on them by neighbouring Indonesia on the pretext of the fight against communism. The war was brought to a controversial conclusion in 1999. However, trauma from that period lives on as evidenced by the testimonies of Nelson Belo, Gregorio Saldanha and Pascal Oliveira, survivors of the infamous 1991 Santa Cruz Massacre. This film recalls the trauma of Timor Leste in this the tenth anniversary of its independence.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Hidden Traces
programme.desc: This documentary series uses cutting edge technology to shed new light on historical conflicts and the characters who lived through them with each episode dealing with a specific event or period in history. The viewer learns what daily life was really like for the common footsoldier during WWI as archeaologists bring their stories to life. An analysis of Napoleons strategy and the impact of the weather reveal why he was defeated by Wellington at Waterloo. Traces of the remains of Hitlers destroyed retreat on the Obersalzberg uncover the extent of the vast structural complex where he spent time with his mistress, Eva Braun. And, many years after the conflict in Vietnam, secret tunnels and unexploded bombs can still be found.

programme.title: Hidden Traces

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: 24 gadus vecais Terijs Rouzs pazūd netālu no purva Džordžijas dienvidos. Viņa māte neatlaidīgi turpina izmeklēšanu, kas notiek paralēli oficiālo iestāžu darbam. Tas, ko viņa un detektīvi galu galā atklāj, šokē visus.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Saša Vasa un Džeremijs Deins atkārtoti izskata izmeklēšanu par noslēpumaino Jorkšīras fermas īpašnieka slepkavību 1933. gadā.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: 24 gadus vecais Terijs Rouzs pazūd netālu no purva Džordžijas dienvidos. Viņa māte neatlaidīgi turpina izmeklēšanu, kas notiek paralēli oficiālo iestāžu darbam. Tas, ko viņa un detektīvi galu galā atklāj, šokē visus.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Saša Vasa un Džeremijs Deins atkārtoti izskata izmeklēšanu par noslēpumaino Jorkšīras fermas īpašnieka slepkavību 1933. gadā.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakara jautrā nakts Luiziānā beidzas ar slepkavību. Viens no vietējā bāra vismīļākajiem ļaudīm tiek atrasts viņa paša asins peļķē.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Bijušais NFL aizsargs Ērika Naposki mīlast trijstūra laikā iesaistījies slepkavības lietā, radot jautājumus par viņa vainu un galvas traumas iespējamo ietekmi.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. Vēlāk izmeklētāju izredzes notvert vainīgo sarūk uz pusi. Raidījums ļauj ielūkoties ASV slepkavību izmeklētāju ikdienā, kuri neatlaidīgi strādā, lai jau pirmajās nozieguma izdarīšanas stundās atklātu pēc iespējas vairāk detaļu par ļaunprātības apstākļiem. Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Filam Spektoram, dēvētam par "trako ģēniju" rokenrolā, bija tieksme pēc ieročiem. Kad policija tiek izsaukta uz viņa savrupmāju, viņi tur atrod sievietes līķi un mūzikas leģendu, kas, šķiet, ir kļuvusi nekontrolējama. Kurš izšāva ieroci? Un kāpēc?

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Uzlecošās zvaigznes Meiplas Batālijas pēdējie dzīves mirkļi iemūžināti novērošanas kamerā - viņa tiek nošauta savā koledžas pilsētiņā Britu Kolumbijā. Kopiena skumst, jo mātes lūgumi pēc taisnīguma piesaista valsts uzmanību.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša izskata lietu ar Saseksas putnu audzētāju, kurš 1924. gadā apraka savas līgavas līķi, bet apgalvoja, ka nav viņu nogalinājis. Viņa tiesas procesā divi izcili patologi nebija vienisprātis par nāves cēloni.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Futbola un svētku nakts izvēršas traģiska - nākamajā dienā mājās tiek atrasts miris jauns Orlandositijas futbola fans. Policijai ir plašs aizdomās turamo loks un ļoti maz atbilžu.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Stāsts par NBA zvaigznes Lorenzena Raita brutālo slepkavību un cīņu par taisnīgumu, ko skatītājiem izstāstīts viņa māte, draugi un pat izmeklētājs, kas apņēmies atklāt šo neatrisināto lietu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Vairāk nekā 500 vīriešu snieguši liecības, ka, apmeklējot Floridas reformu skolu, viņi cietuši no fiziskas un seksuālas vardarbības. Citi stāsta, ka universitātes pilsētiņā studenti nogalināti. Izmeklētāji atklāj satraucošus faktus un neiedomājamas patiesības.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Dino un Klāra Pantāzes veiksmīgi nodarbojas ar ķīlu biznesu, un viņu 20 gadus ilgā laulība šķietami ir ideāla. Kad Klāra mājās tiek nošauta, izmeklētāji prāto, vai vainīgs nav dusmīgs klients, vai arī viņu pasakā slēpjas kas vairāk.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti vēlreiz apskata kroga saimnieces mežonīgo slepkavību gausajā Oksfordšīras ciematā 1922. gadā, kuras rezultātā tika notiesāts kāds 15 gadus vecs vietējais zēns.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Lepnas kāzas kalnu namiņā beidzas ar traģēdiju - vienā no numuriņiem nošauti divi cilvēki. Noslēpumains svešinieks, kurš, šķiet, ir pazudis, varētu būt atslēgas persona šajā notikumā.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: "Maverick" saspēles vadītāja Breta Favra slava un bagātība uzņēmusi drūmu noti: viņš iesaistījies labklājības fonda skandālā, apdraudot viņa grūtā darbā nopelnīto.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Divus vīriešus notiesā par desmit gadus vecās Žanīnas Nikariko nolaupīšanu un nogalināšanu, piespriežot nāvessodu. Abi vīrieši uzstāj uz savu nevainību, un cīnās, lai noskaidrotu īsto slepkavu pirms nāvessoda izpildes datuma.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Dino un Klāra Pantāzes veiksmīgi nodarbojas ar ķīlu biznesu, un viņu 20 gadus ilgā laulība šķietami ir ideāla. Kad Klāra mājās tiek nošauta, izmeklētāji prāto, vai vainīgs nav dusmīgs klients, vai arī viņu pasakā slēpjas kas vairāk.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks ir vīlies popkorna gatavošanas ierīcē, ko pasūtījis, tādēļ viņš un studenti plāno atriebties; Helēna atgriežas skolā, lai iegūtu vidusskolas grādu, bet viņas prombūtnes laikā direktora Durbina birojā iestājas haoss.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pjū kungs plāno ekskursiju uz Ohaio dabaszinātņu Toledo nodaļu. Džeks nevar uzrakstīt pats savu grāmatu, tādēļ viņš piekrīt būt populārā autora Robina Švanka rakstnieks, lai tikai ievietotu Švanka grāmatā savas nodaļas.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Šī ir seriāla pirmā sezona, kurā vairs nefilmējas lieliskais aktieris Stīvs Karels Maikla Skota lomā, tomēr uztraukumam nav pamata, jo īpašais "Ofisa" humors nekur nav pazudis! Šajā sezonā varēsiet sekot līdzi ne tikai pārpratumu un smieklīgu situāciju pilnajai biroja darbinieku ikdienai, bet arī Pemas grūtniecībai. Patiesībā Pemas lomas atveidotāja Dženna Fišere filmēšanās laikā patiešām gaidīja ģimenes pieaugumu. Tomēr Pema nebūs vienīgā mātes cerībās esošā biroja darbiniece. Mazuli gaidīs arī Andžela, par kuras bērnu radīsies mulsinošs jautājums - kurš ir tā īstais tēvs. Turpini dzīvot līdzi biroja darbinieku ikdienai, kas atainota caur ironiski melnu skatījumu!

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Populārajā amerikāņu situāciju komēdijseriālā viss griežas ap Reimondu, kurš ir sporta slejas veidotājs avīzē "Newsday". Viņš kopā ar sievu un trim bērniem dzīvo Longailendā. Turpat pāri ielai mitinās arī viņa vecāki un brālis Roberts. Reimondam ir grūti pastāvēt par savu viedokli, sevišķi, ja tas skar sarunu ar māti. Izņēmuma gadījumi ir tie, kad viņš protestē pret seksu vai kādu triviālu jautājums. Garantējam, ka kolorītā ģimenīte un ikdienas situācijas neļaus smieklu muskuļiem atslābt. Iespējams, ka kādā epizodē ikviens varēs atpazīt arī kaut ko no pašu ikdienas, jo seriāla scenārijs veidots no piedzīvojumiem, kas iespējami katra dzīvē.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Populārajā amerikāņu situāciju komēdijseriālā viss griežas ap Reimondu, kurš ir sporta slejas veidotājs avīzē "Newsday". Viņš kopā ar sievu un trim bērniem dzīvo Longailendā. programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bada pārliecību, ka viņa 40 gadus vecā skolotāja par viņu ir romantiski ieinteresēta, liek smieties visiem. Savukārt cita studente sajūt dūmu smaku un grib visu uguni ap sevi.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kellijas modeļu skola pēkšņi tiek slēgta, un viņa iegūst jaunu darbu kā sveicēja atrakciju parkā "TV World". Kad šo amatu apdraud viņas zemie snieguma rādītāji, Kellija tiek pārcelta uz kādu atrakciju kur viņa spēlē "Verminatoru", kas medī, piemēram, Badu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks nejauši zaudē ievērojamu naudas summu, un tā nonāk studentu rokā. Direktors Durbins un Helēna izmeklē, kurš nozadzis naudu, bet skolēni un skolotāji atzīst citus pārkāpumus.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Direktors Durbins pēc Džeka filozofijas grāmatas izdošanas pārvēršas par varaskāru maniaku.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als degvielas uzpildes stacijā nevar samaksāt rēķinu. Viņš ir spiests uzvilkt formas tērpu ar vārda zīmi "Habib" un sākt šeit strādāt. Savā jaunajā darbā viņš dienu pavadot ar vajājošiem autovadītājiem, Pegu un bērniem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Lejasunktona, Anglija 1653. g. — Sīmuss Makbendijs pieļauj kļūdu, apvainojot raganu. Viņa nobur zemi, uz visiem laikiem pilsētai ieslīgstot tumsā, kamēr vien tajā dzīvo Bandiju tēviņš.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Šī ir seriāla pirmā sezona, kurā vairs nefilmējas lieliskais aktieris Stīvs Karels Maikla Skota lomā, tomēr uztraukumam nav pamata, jo īpašais "Ofisa" humors nekur nav pazudis! Šajā sezonā varēsiet sekot līdzi ne tikai pārpratumu un smieklīgu situāciju pilnajai biroja darbinieku ikdienai, bet arī Pemas grūtniecībai. Patiesībā Pemas lomas atveidotāja Dženna Fišere filmēšanās laikā patiešām gaidīja ģimenes pieaugumu. Tomēr Pema nebūs vienīgā mātes cerībās esošā biroja darbiniece. Mazuli gaidīs arī Andžela, par kuras bērnu radīsies mulsinošs jautājums - kurš ir tā īstais tēvs. Turpini dzīvot līdzi biroja darbinieku ikdienai, kas atainota caur ironiski melnu skatījumu!

programme.title: Draugi

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Populārajā amerikāņu situāciju komēdijseriālā viss griežas ap Reimondu, kurš ir sporta slejas veidotājs avīzē "Newsday". Viņš kopā ar sievu un trim bērniem dzīvo Longailendā. Turpat pāri ielai mitinās arī viņa vecāki un brālis Roberts. Reimondam ir grūti pastāvēt par savu viedokli, sevišķi, ja tas skar sarunu ar māti. Izņēmuma gadījumi ir tie, kad viņš protestē pret seksu vai kādu triviālu jautājums. Garantējam, ka kolorītā ģimenīte un ikdienas situācijas neļaus smieklu muskuļiem atslābt. Iespējams, ka kādā epizodē ikviens varēs atpazīt arī kaut ko no pašu ikdienas, jo seriāla scenārijs veidots no piedzīvojumiem, kas iespējami katra dzīvē.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Populārajā amerikāņu situāciju komēdijseriālā viss griežas ap Reimondu, kurš ir sporta slejas veidotājs avīzē "Newsday". Viņš kopā ar sievu un trim bērniem dzīvo Longailendā. programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als degvielas uzpildes stacijā nevar samaksāt rēķinu. Viņš ir spiests uzvilkt formas tērpu ar vārda zīmi "Habib" un sākt šeit strādāt. Savā jaunajā darbā viņš dienu pavadot ar vajājošiem autovadītājiem, Pegu un bērniem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Lejasunktona, Anglija 1653. g. — Sīmuss Makbendijs pieļauj kļūdu, apvainojot raganu. Viņa nobur zemi, uz visiem laikiem pilsētai ieslīgstot tumsā, kamēr vien tajā dzīvo Bandiju tēviņš.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Sīko noziedznieku Erlu notriec automašīna un viņš pazaudē 100 000 dolāru vērto loterijas biļeti. Narkotiku iespaidā viņš paraksta šķiršanās dokumentus. Tagad viņš tic karmai un veido labojamo kļūdu sarakstu - sākot ar Keniju.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Populārajā amerikāņu situāciju komēdijseriālā viss griežas ap Reimondu, kurš ir sporta slejas veidotājs avīzē "Newsday". Viņš kopā ar sievu un trim bērniem dzīvo Longailendā. programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks liek Marijai aizvest viņu pie ārsta, taču joka dēļ viņam divas reizes tiek veikta viena un tā pati procedūra; skolā Durbins un Helēna apkauno sevi, un bērni sacenšas par klases augstākajiem tituliem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Skola gatavojas ziemas brīvlaikam. Džeks mēģina ierakstīt lekciju cenšoties pavērt ceļu uz Viskonsinas Universitātes filozofijas nodaļu; neapmierināts un nespējot pabeigt video, viņš aizmieg un sāk sapņot murgus.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bandiji priecājas par savu ceļojumu uz Angliju, tērējoties šeit, tērējoties tur. Tikmēr Augšunktonas pilsēta sazvērējas, lai nogalinātu Bandijus ārpus Lejasunktonai, tāpēc lāsts paliks un Augšunktona var turpināt gūt peļņu kā tūristu pilsēta: pilsēta blakus pilsētai tumsā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bandijus stūrī iedzen divas pilsētas. Augšunktona vēlas viņus nogalināt, lai viņi varētu turpināt gūt peļņu kā tūristu slazds, savukārt Lejasunktona vēlas viņu nāvi, lai viņi varētu pārtraukt lāstu. Als pārceļas, lai aizstāvētos un drīz vien nonāk viduslaiku skrējienā pret Igoru. Kurš uzvarēs?

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.desc: Džeks liek Marijai aizvest viņu pie ārsta, taču joka dēļ viņam divas reizes tiek veikta viena un tā pati procedūra; skolā Durbins un Helēna apkauno sevi, un bērni sacenšas par klases augstākajiem tituliem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Skola gatavojas ziemas brīvlaikam. Džeks mēģina ierakstīt lekciju cenšoties pavērt ceļu uz Viskonsinas Universitātes filozofijas nodaļu; neapmierināts un nespējot pabeigt video, viņš aizmieg un sāk sapņot murgus.

programme.title: Komisārs Rikardi
programme.desc: Sarežģīta izmeklēšana atspoguļo Rikardi iekšējo cīņu starp pienākumu komisāra amatā un ilgām pēc cilvēciskām saiknēm.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids ierodas Bazulā un iemīlas vīndarītavas īpašniecē. Viņš joprojām ir pensionējies atraitnis, kas bauda dzīvi mierā un klusumā. Tomēr ienaidnieka atgriešanās izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Seriāla darbība notiek 19. gs. 90. gados. Viljams Mērdoks, kurš aizrautīgi seko līdzi jaunākajiem zinātnes sasniegumiem un bieži izmanto šīs zināšanas arī savā darbā, risina dažādus noziegumus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Seriāla darbība notiek 19. gs. 90. gados. Viljams Mērdoks, kurš aizrautīgi seko līdzi jaunākajiem zinātnes sasniegumiem un bieži izmanto šīs zināšanas arī savā darbā, risina dažādus noziegumus.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids ierodas Bazulā un iemīlas vīndarītavas īpašniecē. Viņš joprojām ir pensionējies atraitnis, kas bauda dzīvi mierā un klusumā. Tomēr ienaidnieka atgriešanās izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss Heriots ir jaunietis, kurš nesen beidzis Glāzgovas Veterināro koledžu, bet darbu atrast ir grūti. Ir 1937. gads, un tas ir liela bezdarba laiks. Bet beidzot uzsmaida veiksme, un Džeimss saņem ielūgumu uz darba interviju Jorkšīrā vetārsta palīga darbam. Darba devējs Zigfrīds Fārnons nav diez ko viesmīlīgs, tomēr Džeimsam izdodas iekarot viņa simpātijas, un darba gaitas var sākties. Seriāls veidots pēc vetārsta Džeimsa Heriota grāmatu motīviem.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Londonā skaistā un gudrā Elaiza Skārleta pēc tēva nāves pēkšņi attopas viena un bez naudas. Taču viņa nekrīt izmisumā un nolemj pārņemt tēva privātdetektīva aģentūru. Taču sievietei nav viegli izcīnīt savu vietu profesijā, kurā dominē vīrieši. Nereti viņai nākas izmeklējamās lietas zagt no tēva protežē, policijas inspektora Viljama Velingtona, galda. Lai arī Velingtonu kaitina Elaizas vēlme strādāt par privātdetektīvi, ar laiku viņš sāk novērtēt viņas prasmes un aso prātu. Elaiza un Velingtons nepārtraukti ķildojas, taču patiesībā viņu vidū virmo dziļas jūtas, un viņiem nāksies kopīgi izmeklēt arī kādu sarežģītu ar Elaizas tēvu saistītu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna slepenībā nonāk īpaši slepenā zinātnes iestādē pēc tam, kad viens no tās darbiniekiem, vecs Birdie biedrs, tiek atrasts līdz nāvei sasalis avarējušā automašīnā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Londonā skaistā un gudrā Elaiza Skārleta pēc tēva nāves pēkšņi attopas viena un bez naudas. programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Džeina Mārpla, pazīstama kā mis Mārpla, ir dāma, kas dzīvo Sentmērimīdā un palīdz draugiem un paziņām atšķetināt visdažādākos noziegumus – izveicīgāko noziedznieku pastrādātas slepkavības visnegaidītākajās vietās ar visneparastākajiem motīviem –, taču neviens nevar mēroties gudrībā un atjautībā ar mis Mārplu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir nonākušas līdz savu spēju robežai, jo visiem ir alibi. Vai izdosiet uzzināt, kurš nogalināja seru Pīteru, pirms cieš vēl kāds cits?

programme.title: Monmartrs
programme.desc: Parīze, 1899. g. Seleste izmisīgi meklē savus zudušos radiniekus, Arsēns slēpj aizliegtu mīlestību, bet Roza ir ieslodzīta bordelī. Viņu likteņi ir savijušies zem Monmartras debesīm.

programme.title: Monmartrs
programme.desc: Seleste atklāj jaunu aizdomās turamo, kurš varētu būt saistīts ar viņas tēva nāvi. Aizspriedumu dēļ Arsēns varētu zaudēt nozīmīgu līgumu, bet Roza saņem ļoti labas ziņas.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids uzņemas risināt šausminošu slepkavības lietu, kas satricina vietējo pilsētiņu. Terēzai ir informācija, ko viņa neatklāj, Speids turpina izmeklēt, neapzinoties, ka var kļūt par nākamo upuri.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Londonā skaistā un gudrā Elaiza Skārleta pēc tēva nāves pēkšņi attopas viena un bez naudas. programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Izrādās, ka Zigfrīdam Fārnonam ir jaunāks brālis vārdā Tristans. Viņš atgriežas no Veterinārās koledžas Edinburgā. Zigfrīds ir tik laimīgs, ka viņa mazais brālis pabeidzis studijas, tāpēc nopērk viņam auto. Nez kāpēc Tristans jūtas ļoti nomākts šīs dāvanas dēļ. Viņi ar Džeimsu nolemj kļūt par draugiem, lai varētu izdzīvot Zigfrīda uzraudzībā un izturēt viņa dusmu lēkmes.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Pulksten 4.50 no Pedingtonas Mis Mārplas draudzene Elspeta kļūst par liecinieci slepkavībai garāmbraucošā vilcienā. Mis Mārpla iefiltrē savu paziņu Lūsiju īpašumā, kur, viņasprāt, varētu atrasties līķis. Raterfordholā dzīvo Krekentorpu ģimene, kur jaunākā paaudze cīnās par tiesībām uz mantojumu. Lūsija, kas tur ierodas kā saimniecības vadītāja uz Ziemassvētku laiku, slepus iegūst informāciju un piespēlē to mis Mārplai.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем.
