programme.title: Колдуньи
programme.desc: Существование магии будоражит сознание людей на протяжении долгого времени. Большинство мечтает обладать мистическими способностями. Люди полагают, что подобный дар избавит их от бесконечных трудностей, позволит распоряжаться своей жизнь самостоятельно и без труда избавляться от неприятностей. Кажется, быть ведьмой мечта любой женщины. Трудно представить, что незавидная участь несет за собой множество последствий. Героиням предстоит узнать это на собственном опыте. История обычных девушек Ники, Марго, Сони и Дины, жизнь которых вращается вокруг карьеры, творчества, учебы и любви. Они сталкивались с трудностями, пытались решить их и не задумывались о магии. В их представлении мистические истории были плодом чужой фантазии. Не хватало времени думать о таких глупостях. Но однажды они случайно открывают доступ к Источнику Силы и получают магические способности. Теперь девушкам придется не только привыкать к своему новому статусу колдуний, но и бороться с мощной и опасной ведьмой…

Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. programme.title: Колдуньи
programme.desc: Существование магии будоражит сознание людей на протяжении долгого времени. Большинство мечтает обладать мистическими способностями. Люди полагают, что подобный дар избавит их от бесконечных трудностей, позволит распоряжаться своей жизнь самостоятельно и без труда избавляться от неприятностей. Кажется, быть ведьмой мечта любой женщины. Трудно представить, что незавидная участь несет за собой множество последствий. Героиням предстоит узнать это на собственном опыте. История обычных девушек Ники, Марго, Сони и Дины, жизнь которых вращается вокруг карьеры, творчества, учебы и любви. Они сталкивались с трудностями, пытались решить их и не задумывались о магии. В их представлении мистические истории были плодом чужой фантазии. Не хватало времени думать о таких глупостях. Но однажды они случайно открывают доступ к Источнику Силы и получают магические способности. Теперь девушкам придется не только привыкать к своему новому статусу колдуний, но и бороться с мощной и опасной ведьмой…

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: The Flock
programme.desc: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

programme.title: Cleanskin
programme.desc: Thriller. Thriller, produced in 2012. Co-produced by the USA and the UK. A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

programme.title: Existenz
programme.desc: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: Science fiction movie. Canadian sci-fi, produced in 2017. A dystopian thriller set in the year 2030 that sees the world in a permanent state of economic recession and facing serious environmental problems as a result of global warming.

programme.title: Slackers
programme.desc: When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the colleges most popular girl.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: The story of Ben Sweet (Nick Roth), an eighteen-year-old middle-class man who enrolls at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There, he plunges into a life of sex, drugs, and rock n roll, as well as political activism that turns his conservative world upside down and sets him on a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: A South Central L.A. con artist with rap skills tries to keep bill collectors and his lover, with marriage in mind, at bay by entering a poetry contest staged by a small Irish town. Can his rhyming skills help the town and win him the prize money?

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Jungle Boy
programme.desc: In a humble village on the edge of the jungle, a young boy strays from his mother to play with a monkey. Lost in the jungle, he is saved by the great elephant, who will raise him as a member of the great family of animals. When he grows up he helps to protect the jungle from a ruthless poacher.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer gets pushed to the edge after he is profiled and assaulted by the colleagues he worked side by side with, so he decides to get revenge and take his frustrations out on the community that he swore to protect.

programme.title: Hit List
programme.desc: Charlotte is a woman with anger management issues whose therapist suggests she write a journal to keep her emotions in check. Unlucky in love, she ventures online to find a boyfriend. Just as she reaches her limit of unsuccessful dates, Charlotte meets her soul mate Lyle. Everything is perfect until Lyle finds Charlottes journal and sets out to prove just how deeply he loves her.

programme.title: Naudas monstrs
programme.desc: Lī Geitss ir superpopulārā TV raidījuma Naudas monstrs vadītājs. Viņa ieteikumos, kā labāk ieguldīt naudu, ieklausās visa Ņujorka. Taču, kad kādas kompānijas, kurā Lī iedrošināja skatītājus ieguldīt līdzekļus, akciju cena negaidīti nokrītas, viens no bankrotējušajiem noguldītājiem ielaužas studijā un tiešraidē sagrābj ķīlniekus – gan pašu Lī Geitsu, gan raidījuma producenti Petiju. Lai izglābtos, Lī un Petijai nāksies zibenīgi noskaidrot kompānijas akciju aizdomīgā krituma iemeslus.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Artemīda"
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi risinās tuvā nākotnē kādā nelegālā slimnīcā Losandželosā, kur slepus ārstējas pilsētas nežēlīgākie noziedznieki. Slimnīca, kas slēpjas aiz viesnīcas Artemīda izkārtnes, ir miera osta ļaundariem, taču viss mainās, kad iestādījuma vadītāja Džīna Tomasa atklāj, ka viens no pacientiem patiesībā te atrodas ar mērķi nogalināt otru pacientu.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pastaiga pludmalē ar kurtu.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Naudas monstrs
programme.desc: Lī Geitss ir superpopulārā TV raidījuma Naudas monstrs vadītājs. Viņa ieteikumos, kā labāk ieguldīt naudu, ieklausās visa Ņujorka. Taču, kad kādas kompānijas, kurā Lī iedrošināja skatītājus ieguldīt līdzekļus, akciju cena negaidīti nokrītas, viens no bankrotējušajiem noguldītājiem ielaužas studijā un tiešraidē sagrābj ķīlniekus – gan pašu Lī Geitsu, gan raidījuma producenti Petiju. Lai izglābtos, Lī un Petijai nāksies zibenīgi noskaidrot kompānijas akciju aizdomīgā krituma iemeslus.

programme.title: Krutie kruķi
programme.desc: Nikolass Endžels ir labākais Londonas policists. Viņš arestē par 400% vairāk noziedznieku nekā jebkurš cits likuma sargs. Viņš ir tik spējīgs, ka visus citus atstāj kaunā. Tādēļ Endžela priekšniecība viņu nosūta uz vietu, kur viņa dotības nemetīs ēnu pār citiem - uz rāmo, šķietami nevainīgo Sendfordu. Kad ciematu satricina vairāki drausmi negadījumi, Endželā mostas pārliecība, ka ārējais iespaids ir maldinošs...

programme.title: Viesnīca "Artemīda"
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi risinās tuvā nākotnē kādā nelegālā slimnīcā Losandželosā, kur slepus ārstējas pilsētas nežēlīgākie noziedznieki. programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. Slepkavības izmeklēšanu uzsāk harizmātiskais un skrupulozais detektīvs Benuā Blanks, kuram acumirklī kļūst skaidrs – slepkavību ir pastrādājis kāds no Trombija plašās ģimenes locekļiem. Bet kurš tieši? Atjautības spēle uz dzīvību un nāvi ir sākusies!

programme.title: Telefona būda
programme.desc: Kad telefona būdā zvana telefons, ne pārāk principiāls rakstnieks Stjū automātiski atbild uz zvanu un acumirklī nonāk bīstamā spēlē. Zvanītājs apgalvo – ja Stjū noliks klausuli, viņš... mirs. Drīz vien pie telefona būdas sāk pulcēties ļaudis, lai noskaidrotu, ko jaunais vīrietis tik ilgi tur dara, un tad blakus notiek slepkavība. Vienīgais aizdomās turamais, protams, ir vīrietis telefona būdā. Ielu tūdaļ pārpludina policijas vienību automašīnas, un policijas virsnieki pavēl Stjū pamest būdu. Taču balss klausulē atkārto: "Ja tu to izdarīsi, tu mirsi," un viņam ir pamats tam ticēt.

programme.title: Naudas spēle
programme.desc: Oakland A ģenerālmenedžera Billija Bīna sekmīgais mēģinājums izveidot beisbola komandu ar aizņemtu naudu, talkā ņemot datora ģenerētu analītiku jaunu spēlētāju uzņemšanai.

programme.title: Trakā, dullā mīlestība
programme.desc: Komēdija ar Stīvu Karelu, Raienu Goslingu, Džulianu Mūru un Emmu Stounu. Kals Vīvers ir veiksminieks - viņam ir lielisks darbs, sapņu māja, jauki bērni un mīļotā sieva, ar kuru viņš iepazinās jau vidusskolā. Kad Kals uzzina, ka sieva viņu krāpj un pieprasa šķiršanos, viņa ideālā dzīve sabrūk. Visu vēl vairāk sarežģī tas, ka Kals jau vairākas desmitgades nav bijis uz randiņiem - par spīti viņa centieniem, iepazīšanās ar citām sievietēm ir ļoti neveikla, un šķiet, ka Kala dzīve ir nolemta vientulībai. Kad viņš satiek siržu lauzēju un randiņu ekspertu Džeikobu, parādās cerība.

programme.title: Apokalipto
programme.desc: Maiju valstībai piedzīvojot tās norietu, jauns vīrietis dodas bīstamā ceļojumā uz pasauli, kurā valda bailes un apspiešana.

programme.title: Atriebība
programme.desc: Kad noslēpumains zvanītājs novieto spridzekli zem Meta Tērnera mašīnas sēdekļa, sākas strauja pakaļdzīšanās pāri visai pilsētai, lai izpildītu virkni specifisku uzdevumu. Ar bērniem uz aizmugurējā sēdekļa un spridzekli, kas eksplodēs, ja viņi izkāps no mašīnas, ikdienišķs brauciens kļūst par spēli uz dzīvību un nāvi. Lai izdzīvotu un glābtu savu ģimeni, Metam ierobežotā laikā jāizpilda aizvien bīstamākas svešinieka norādes.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Nebraska
programme.desc: Vecais kara veterāns Vudijs ir saņēmis vēstuli, ka ir laimējis miljonu dolāru. Viņš vairākkārt aizlavās no mājām un apņēmīgi soļo uz Linkolnu, kas atrodas tūkstošiem kilometru attālumā, lai to saņemtu, bet vienmēr tiek apturēts. Dēls Deivids apžēlojas un ved viņu ar auto. Pa ceļam, satiekot cilvēkus no viņa pagātnes, atklājas patiesais Vudija dzīvesstāsts, mīlas attiecības, kara traumas, neveiksmes biznesā. Mazliet jautrā un arī skumjā melnā komēdija uzņemta melnbaltās krāsās un ir nominēta Oskaram sešās kategorijās, kā arī ieguvusi daudzus prestižus kino apbalvojumus.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta"
programme.desc: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta" stāsta par Eiropā slavenās viesnīcas leģendārā viesmīļa Gustava H un portjē Zero Mustafa piedzīvojumiem. Viesnīcas darbinieki kļūst par lieciniekiem nenovērtējamas renesanses gleznas zādzībai, kādas bagātas ģimenes cīņai par milzīgu mantojumu un dramatiskām izmaiņām, kuras notiek Eiropā periodā starp diviem pasaules kariem.

programme.title: Mēness Lēkta Karaļvalsts
programme.desc: Tajā ir bāka, skautu kustības zēni, sentimentāls policijas kapteinis, kautrīgs skautu vadītājs, ekscentriski neveiksminieki vecāki, nelietīga sociālā dienesta darbiniece un Šekspīra lugu cienīgas kaislības, kas, brāžoties no ekrāna, kā viļņi vētrā apņem skatītājus.

programme.desc: Tajā ir bāka, skautu kustības zēni, sentimentāls policijas kapteinis, kautrīgs skautu vadītājs, ekscentriski neveiksminieki vecāki, nelietīga sociālā dienesta darbiniece un Šekspīra lugu cienīgas kaislības, kas, brāžoties no ekrāna, kā viļņi vētrā apņem skatītājus.

programme.title: Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā
programme.desc: "Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā" ir ieskats notikumos, kas veidoja vienu no pretrunīgākajiem un noslēpumainākajiem amerikāņu rakstniekiem – Dž. D. Selindžeru. Filmas darbība risinās 20. gadsimta vidū Ņujorkā, kad jaunais Selindžers meklē savu vietu dzīvē. Pārciestais frontē 2. Pasaules karā, mīlas dēka ar augstāko aprindu jaunkundzi Ūnu ONīlu un pirmie literārie centieni – šī pieredze ir pamatā viņa pasaulē, iespējams, slavenākajam literārajam meistardarbam "Uz kraujas rudzu laukā". Galvenās lomas atveido jaunais britu aktieris Nikolass Holts un sevi jau pierādījušais ASV kino meistars Kevins Speisijs.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. Ar palīdzību no Kongresa viņai izdodas aizsākt vēsturisku normatīvo aktu pieņemšanu, kas palīdzēs turpmāk sievietēm iegūt tādas iespējas un aizsardzību, kāda līdz šim nav bijusi.

programme.title: Puisis
programme.desc: Jauns žurnālists Gotjērs uzzinājis, ka viņš ir franču popdziedātāja Gaja Džemeta ārlaulības dēls. Kamēr veco laiku zvaigzne dodas tūrē, lai reklamētu savu jauno albumu, Gotjērs nolemj sekot viņam aizkulisēs, uz skatuves un ceļā. Viņa iegansts - viņš it kā filmē dokumentālo filmu par mūziķa karjeru.

programme.title: Sirds pukst skaļi
programme.desc: Stāsts par neparastu tēva un meitas dziesminieku duetu vasarā pirms došanās uz koledžu.

programme.title: Patiesība par emanuēlu
programme.desc: Nomākta meitene kļūst aizņemta ar noslēpumianu kaimiņu, kam ir pārlieku aizdomīgas līdzības ar viņas mirušo māti.

programme.title: Tu neesi tu
programme.desc: Algotais slepkava ar iesauku "Nāves eņģelis" Maikls Salivans uzticīgi kalpo savam bosam Džonam Rūnijam, pateicoties kuram reiz uz ielas atrastais bārenis Maiks ir ieguvis "augstāko izglītību" gangsteru profesijā. Aukstasinīgais un nežēlīgais Rūnijs - Čikāgas īru mafijas krusttēvs - , kura organizācija asi konkurē ar itāļiem, veldzējumu savai sirdij gūst vienīgi Maikla sabiedrībā un rotaļājoties ar Maikla abiem dēliem Maiklu junioru un Pīteru. Abu pusaudžu acīs pilsētas gangsteru vadonis ir ne vairāk kā jauks vectēvs - interesantu un audzinošu stāstu zinātājs un zēnu labākais draugs viņu kopējās spēlēs.

programme.title: Sirds pukst skaļi

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay: Holiday Throwdown
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson takes Bobby Flay on a trip around the world with chefs Gabe Bertaccini, Marcus Samuelsson and Maneet Chauhan. Each round, the acclaimed chefs celebrate ingredients that are commonly found at holiday markets across the globe.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three bakers compete to win a mammoth $25,000 by creating spectacular gingerbread cakes based on a scene from a famous movie in this scrumptious cooking show. After being given their respective scenes which they must replicate as perfectly as possible, the judges will asses their edible creations and decide who has impressed the most. These delectable showpieces are as extravagant as they are intricate, with the bakers meticulously detailing each aspect of their respective scenes. One baker will be selected to compete in the finale, where they will have a chance of winning the whopping cash prize.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Ceļotāju paaudze
programme.desc: Viņi ir radīti mēģenē un īpaši gatavoti šai misijai. No šiem cilvēkiem ir atkarīgs visas cilvēces liktenis. Tāltālajā ceļojumā sūtītie jaunieši ir saikne starp pagātnes un nākotnes paaudzēm. Pēc dīvainās jauniešu audzinātāja nāves viņu dzīve kļūst nekontrolēta. Viņi vairs nedzer medikamentus, un viņus pārņem līdz šim svešas cilvēciskas jūtas un vēlmes - mīlestība un kaisle.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Sera Saimona de Kentervila rēgs jau 300 gadus klīst pa savrupmāju, meklēdams drosmīgu pēcnācēju, kurš viņu varētu atbrīvot no Kentervila lāsta. Kad šajā savrupmājā ievācas kāda amerikāņu ģimene, spokam parādās cerību stariņš beidzot tapt atbrīvotam.

programme.title: Bestsellers
programme.desc: Untumains pensionēts rakstnieks negribīgi sāk piedalīties savas pēdējās grāmatas veicināšanas kampaņā, lai izpalīdzētu jaunai izdevējai.

programme.title: Mazulīte
programme.desc: Augsta līmeņa vadītāja liek uz spēles savu karjeru un ģimeni, kad sāk kaislīgas attiecības ar krietni jaunāku praktikantu.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli, liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs – ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam, un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Pēdējais strēlnieks
programme.desc: 2. pasaules kara veterāns aizbēg no mājām Ziemeļīrijā, dototies grūtā, bet iedvesmojošā ceļojumā uz Franciju, lai piedalītos D dienas 75. atceres gadadienā, un atrod drosmi stāties pretī saviem pagātnes rēgiem.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Darba rūķis
programme.desc: Levons Keids pameta godalgotu militāro karjeru slepenajās operācijās, lai dzīvotu vienkāršu dzīvi, strādājot celtniecībā. Bet, kad viņa priekšnieka meitu, kas viņam ir kā radiniece, nolaupa cilvēku tirgotāji, viņš atklāj korupcijas pasauli, kas ir daudz lielāka, nekā viņš varēja iedomāties.

programme.title: Kaķu mīlis
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Margo piestrādā nelielā kinoteātrī, kur iepazīstas ar biežu tā apmeklētāju, par sevi vecāko Robertu. Pāri letei aizsāktais flirts pārtop nepārtrauktā čatošanā. Kad abi nonāk līdz randiņam, Margo atklāj, ka dzīvē satiktais Roberts itin nemaz neatbilst tam Robertam, ar kuru viņa flirtējusi īsziņās. Skarbs vēstījums par dzimumu dalījumu, ķepurošanos cauri modernās randiņošanas staignājam un to, kādas bīstamas īpašības mēs mēdzam piedēvēt cilvēkiem otrpus mūsu telefoniem.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: 4. jūlijā, Neatkarības dienas svētku brīvdienās, valsti apdraud uzbrukums neaizsargātajai ASV infrastruktūrai. Noslēpumainais nozieguma izplānotājs ir pārdomājis visus mūsdienu aizsardzības aspektus, bet nav rēķinājies ar vecā kaluma pretinieku Džonu Makleinu. Bez maskas. Bez apmetņa. Bez problēmām.

programme.title: Pārdozēšana
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi seko Sārai, Tulūzas narkotiku apkarošanas grupas vadītājai, un Ričardam, vietējās kriminālpolicijas bosam. Sāra spiesta sadarboties ar Ričardu, lai apturētu metamfetamīna tirgošanu starp Spāniju un Franciju un atrastu slepkavu, kas saistīts ar šo lietu.

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam, un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Rūķi atgriežas atkal
programme.desc: Helvijas pasaule sagriežas kājām gaisā, kad viņa atklāj, ka pastāv tehniski attīstītu rūķu banda no Vīnes, kas, pretstatā Helvijas klanam, ir nepārspējami jautrības un piedzīvojumu meklētāji. Vai Helvijas draudzība ar Bo, jaunāko no rūķu bandas, spēs samierināt abus rūķu klanus pēc vairāk nekā 250 gadu pārtraukuma?

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 3: Dinozauru ēra
programme.desc: Filmu "Ledus laikmets" un "Ledus Laikmets 2" varoņi ir atgriezušies - gatavi jauniem piedzīvojumiem. Skrets joprojām nododas nenotveramās zīles medībām. Menijs un Elija gaida mazuļa piedzimšanu, sliņķis Sids mēģina iztēloties ģimenes dzīvi, rūpējoties par nočieptām dinozaura olām, bet zobenzobu tīģeris Djego apsver, vai viņš nav kļuvis pārāk mīkstčaulīgs, tik daudz laika pavadot draugu kompānijā. Dodoties glābt nelaimē nokļuvušo Sidu, draugi nokļūst neparastā pazemes pasaulē, kur aci pret aci sastopas ar dinozauriem un ir spiesti cīnīties gan ar zvēriem, gan augiem.

programme.title: Vēl pa vienai
programme.desc: Oskarotā Tomasa Vinterberga filma par četriem draugiem un kolēģiem, ģimnāzijas skolotājiem. Visi četri cīnās ar nemotivētiem skolēniem un jūtas iestrēguši rutīnā. Nikolaja 40 gadu jubilejā draugu sarunas noved pie norvēģu psihiatra Finna Skorderuda teorijas, ka cilvēks dzīvo ar 0,05 promiļu iztrūkumu. Četrotne nolemj veikt eksperimentu un pārbaudīt šo teoriju dzīvē. Tomēr, eksperimentam turpinoties, vīri sastopas katrs ar savu personīgās dzīves izaicinājumu.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Mirušie nesāpina
programme.desc: Divi pionieri Amerikas pilsoņu kara laikā frontē cīnās par savu dzīvību un mīlestību.

programme.title: Sisu
programme.desc: Dziļi Lapzemes savvaļā Aatami Korpi meklē zeltu. Kad viņš sastopas ar nacistu patruļu, sākas elpu aizraujoša un pēc zelta alkstoša vajāšana pa iznīcināto un mīnēto Lapzemes mežonīgo savvaļu.

programme.title: Sarkanā Džoana
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par krievu spiedzi, kas novērsa Trešo Pasaules karu. Britu izlūkdienests ilgus gadus centās viņu atklāt, viņas vārds kļuva par leģendu. Tomēr par šo viņas varoņdarbu sabiedrība uzzināja pavisam nesen, kad lietai tika noņemts slepenības grifs.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Alaves - Real Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Fenerbahce Beko Istanbul - Panathinaikos AKTOR Athens
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. St. Pauli - Heidenheim
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Dubai - Maccabi
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Fenerbahce - Panathinaikos

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Celta - Athletic Bilbao
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Rayo Vallecano - Real Betis

programme.title: NBA .. Nuggets - Rockets
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Bayern - Mainz
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.desc: Chip and Jo bring what they love most about "home" into their redesign of a local shelter for girls, using their construction crew and favourite artisans.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.desc: With the help of Mike and Grumpy, Gray brings her expertise to help a neighbour, who is building a new home in Summervilles historic district.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: Chip and Jo update a young professionals classic mid-century into a sleek modern home in Waco, TX. They add architectural elements of wood, metal and glass.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Holmes Family Rescue
programme.desc: Mike, Sherry and Michael dig into a full backyard overhaul as they redirect floodwaters plaguing a familys basement.

programme.title: Sin City Rehab
programme.desc: Returning home to Las Vegas, Alisons first project becomes a mess when she and a contractor arent in sync with the clients wishes.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A couple launches their home-reno venture with a tattered suburban duplex. Theyre determined to transform it into a stunning single-family home.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: Identical twin sisters who specialise in refinishing furniture tackle their ultimate midlife project: a century-old farmhouse in Idaho.

programme.title: The Flip Off
programme.desc: Tarek and Heather compete against his ex, Christina, to see who can out-flip the other in a main suite battle - and Christina decides to play dirty!

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Chris Bledsoes daughter Emily purportedly has similar abilities to her father--and when the team combines her with Chris at the Monroe Institute and the Florida Everglades, the confounding results are truly out of this world.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul team up with the investigator of Skinwalker Ranch to probe an abandoned New Mexico ranch whose owner claims is infested with malevolent demons; their attempts at communication with this phenomenon opens up a chilling "conversation."

programme.desc: Imagine a city where the commute requires a zip line, or a town crawling with some strange monkeys, and even a spot that holds a beautiful waterfall that spews blood. Get your passports ready, as we take a tour of the most unusual places in history.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
